question:
Smart National Common Mobility Card (NCMC):
  1. is an initiative of Ministry of Urban Development
  2. provides the user with seamless travel as well as retail shopping and purchases facilities
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
Smart National Common Mobility Card (NCMC) is a model to enable seamless travel by different metros and other transport systems across the country besides retail shopping and purchases. It is an initiative of Ministry of Urban Development.
